markdownRemark.html:
Microwave Steamed Egg

Don't overcook the eggs!

Tools

  • mug
  • small bowl
  • fork/whisk

Ingredients

  • 2 large eggs
  • 1/4 cup milk
  • salt
  • sesame oil
  • soy sauce
  • chopped green onion

Steps

  1. Mix eggs, milk, and salt to taste in mug.
  2. Cover with a bowl and microwave for 1 minute on high, then in 30 second and 15 second intervals until egg is just set.
  3. Season with soy sauce and sesame oil. Garnish with green onion.
